title: Iozzio Cycles Strikeout Special Edition Fundraiser Raffle for 4/20
content:
Iozzio Cycles, makers of the ingenious one-hitter dugout that lives in your steerer tube (1 1/8″ and 1″) dubbed the Shotgun, have developed a new product called the Strikeout which includes a reusable match and one-hitter. Find out how you can win a Strikeout and help out Food with Fam, a NYC-based non-profit below.

All proceeds from this fundraiser raffle are in benefit for Food with Fam, which is a mutual aid organization committed to keeping NYC fed by hosting bi-weekly food drives and much more. Their efforts help to feed families and individuals in need.

$15 per entry and you can pay through any of the venues below:

Venmo: @iozziocycles
Cashapp: $jesseiozzio
PayPal: jesseiozzio@gmail.com

Please provide a valid email for further instructions.

Iozzio has raised about $330 to date it would be amazing if they could hit $1000!

The drawing will occur on 4/20.

All raffle participants can redeem a single ticket for purchases on any product at iozzio.life
author: prolly
